QuestData.Title: Aerial Surveillance
QuestData.Description: You did a good job helping Wes with getting that flying machine back up and running.$B$BIf you'd like to help us further, there is an unusual weather pattern coming in from the northeast. I have a pilot ready to work for me, but I'm afraid he needs a copilot.$B$BIf you think you're up to it, you can take the flight to Lakeside Landing. Tell Vic I sent you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Professor Calvert wants you to take the flight to Lakeside Landing and speak with Pilot Vic there.
QuestData.RewardText: The professor sent you my way? All right.
